message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to make a decent profit. How about we try $130?
I'm really close to my budget, but I think we can do even better. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $122?
I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet in the middle at $127?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $123?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $128. It's my minimum acceptable price. Take it or leave it!
